title: The best deals of Black Friday 2024: Phones, smart home devices, and a whole lot more
description: Our curated rundown contains more than 80 top tech offers, with new deals being added regularly.
author: Matt Horne
excerpt: We've sifted through thousands of Black Friday deals to bring you a round-up of the best offers on all things tech.
text: We’re on the brink of Black Friday, which means it’s full steam ahead for the sales. The retailers are clamoring to get your business, and you can turn that to your advantage. Huge sales on tech, from Android phones and tablets to wearables and smart home devices, are coming thick and fast. Here’s our rundown of the best Black Friday deals of 2024.The deals can change quickly, and we’ll be updating this curated collection of deals regularly to reflect that.Black Friday 2024 retailer deals We’ve done the leg work for you when it comes to picking out the best Black Friday deals, but you might prefer to peruse the full selection of each retailer yourself. You can find links to each outlet’s online shop below. Amazon — Holiday Deals Best Buy — Doorbuster Deals Samsung — Black Friday Deals Dell — Top Black Friday Deals B&H — Holiday Head Start HP — Holiday Gift Guide Walmart — Black Friday Deals Adorama — Black Friday Price Now Black Friday deals 2024 SmartphonesRyan Whitwam / Android AuthorityLeft to right: Pixel Fold, Pixel 9 Pro Fold, OnePlus Open, Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6The bigger the purchase, the better it is to wait for the Black Friday deals to roll around. That makes this the perfect time to pick up that pricey handset you’ve had your eye on all year, and we’re anticipating some bumper offers this holiday season. There are likely to be record deals on the latest flagships from Samsung and OnePlus, while we also anticipate some of the first notable price drops on the stunning Google Pixel 9 range.The only downside is that you’re unlikely to see unlocked models of the iPhone 16 on sale. Apple is famous for its thrift when it comes to discounting its latest devices, so even the biggest sales event of the year is very unlikely to bring savings on the iOS options.Google Pixel 9 Pro XLGoogle Pixel 9 Pro XLPure XL-ence.Google reserves its best hardware for the largest device in the line. The Google Pixel 9 Pro XL offers a 6.8-inch display, the biggest battery we've ever seen in a Pixel phone, and 37W wired charging. html:
We’re on the brink of Black Friday, which means it’s full steam ahead for the sales. The retailers are clamoring to get your business, and you can turn that to your advantage. Huge sales on tech, from Android phones and tablets to wearables and smart home devices, are coming thick and fast. Here’s our rundown of the best Black Friday deals of 2024.

The deals can change quickly, and we’ll be updating this curated collection of deals regularly to reflect that.

Black Friday 2024 retailer deals

We’ve done the leg work for you when it comes to picking out the best Black Friday deals, but you might prefer to peruse the full selection of each retailer yourself. You can find links to each outlet’s online shop below.

  • Amazon — Holiday Deals
  • Best Buy — Doorbuster Deals
  • Samsung — Black Friday Deals
  • Dell — Top Black Friday Deals
  • B&H — Holiday Head Start
  • HP — Holiday Gift Guide
  • Walmart — Black Friday Deals
  • Adorama — Black Friday Price Now

Black Friday deals 2024

Smartphones

Ryan Whitwam / Android Authority

Left to right: Pixel Fold, Pixel 9 Pro Fold, OnePlus Open, Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6

The bigger the purchase, the better it is to wait for the Black Friday deals to roll around. That makes this the perfect time to pick up that pricey handset you’ve had your eye on all year, and we’re anticipating some bumper offers this holiday season. There are likely to be record deals on the latest flagships from Samsung and OnePlus, while we also anticipate some of the first notable price drops on the stunning Google Pixel 9 range.

The only downside is that you’re unlikely to see unlocked models of the iPhone 16 on sale. Apple is famous for its thrift when it comes to discounting its latest devices, so even the biggest sales event of the year is very unlikely to bring savings on the iOS options.

Google Pixel 9 Pro XL

Google Pixel 9 Pro XL

Pure XL-ence.

Google reserves its best hardware for the largest device in the line. The Google Pixel 9 Pro XL offers a 6.8-inch display, the biggest battery we've ever seen in a Pixel phone, and 37W wired charging. Otherwise, the Pixel 9 Pro and the Pixel 9 Pro XL share almost all other hardware and software features, giving users the option between display sizes with top hardware.

Smartphone deals

  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 for $1,099.99 ($800 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 6 for $849.99 ($250 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra for $949.99 ($350 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus for $724.99 ($275 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy S24 FE for $474.99 ($175 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy A35 5G for $299.99 ($100 off)
  • Google Pixel 9 for $649 ($150 off)
  • Google Pixel 9 Pro for $799 ($200 off)
  • Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold for $1,499 ($300 off)
  • Google Pixel Fold for $1,199 ($600 off)
  • Motorola Razr (2024) for $424.98 ($275 off)
  • Motorola Razr Plus (2024) for $799.99 ($200 off)
  • Moto G Stylus 5G (2024) for $237.48 ($162 off)
  • Moto G Play (2024) for $101.87 ($48 off)
  • OnePlus 12R (256GB) for $499.99 ($100 off)
  • OnePlus Open for $1,199.99 ($500 off)

Smart home devices

SPONSORED

Roborock S8 MaxV Ultra: Cleaning Beyond Limits

A robot vacuum is the cornerstone of any smart home, and Roborock is a leading light when it comes to our automated cleaning friends. The manufacturer’s latest flagship product is the Roborock S8 MaxV Ultra, which promises Cleaning Beyond Limits. This includes Revolutionary Cornor-to-Edge Cleaning, with the FlixiArm Design Side Brush and Extra Edge Mopping system ensuring that those spots that most robot vacuums miss are thoroughly cleaned.

An industry-leading suction power of 10,000Pa snaffles up everything in this vac’s path, and a Carpet Boost+ System adds a 30% higher hair pick-up rate compared to previous models. PresciSense LIDAR navigation and Reactive AI 2.0 Obstacle Recognition combine to keep the S8 MaxV Ultra voyaging around your floor unheeded. You also don’t have to lift a finger once the device returns to the all-in-one dock, with everything from emptying and refilling to cleaning, drying, and dispensing detergent being automated.

It’s not a cheap option, but we’ve reviewed the Roborock S8 MaxV Ultra ourselves, and it’s worth every cent. Starting from November 21, it’s also on sale for the Black Friday period with huge savings of 39% off the MSRP. That brings the price down to just $1,099 — just in time to help you keep your home spotless over the holidays.

Roborock S8 MaxV Ultra

Roborock S8 MaxV Ultra

Roborock's top robovac for 2024.

The Roborock S8 MaxV is an ultra-premium robot vacuum and mop with loads of smart features, a pet monitoring system, and self-cleaning capabilities.

Smart home devices

  • Eureka Stylus Elite for $198 ($82 off)
  • Narwal Freo Robot Vacuum and Mop for $499.99 ($400 off)
  • Roborock S8 MaxV Ultra Robot Vacuum & Sonic Mop for $1,099.99 ($700 off)
  • Amazon Echo Show 5 for $44.99 ($45 off)
  • Amazon Echo Show 8 for $79.99 ($70 off)
  • Amazon Echo Hub for $124.99 ($55 off)
  • Blink Outdoor 4 for $39.99 ($60 off)
  • Ring Stick Up Cam Battery for $54.99 ($45 off)
  • Ring Alarm 5-Piece Kit for $119.99 ($80 off)
  • Google Nest Doorbell (Battery) for $99.98 ($80 off)
  • Kasa Smart Bulb for $6.99 ($8 off)
  • Kasa Smart Plug Ultra Mini (2-Pack) for $10.99 ($9 off)
  • Govee Neon Rope Light 2 for $41.99 ($28 off)
  • Honeywell Home Smart Color Thermostat for $99.99 ($80 off)
  • Google Nest Thermostat for $84.99 ($45 off)

Headphones and earbuds

C. Scott Brown / Android Authority

Great headphones can transform the way you experience music, podcasts, or even a favorite movie. Your ears and your playlists deserve the best, but the finest headphones and earbuds don’t come cheap. The experts at our sister site, SoundGuys, can help you decide which headsets are worth buying, and we’ll highlight all of the best Black Friday deals on that hardware below.

Headphone deals

  • Apple AirPods Max for $399 ($150 off)
  • Sony WH-1000XM5 for $298 ($102 off)
  • Sony WH-1000XM4 for $198 ($152 off)
  • Sony WH-CH720N for $88 ($62 off)
  • Bose QuietComfort for $199 ($150 off)
  • Bose QuietComfort Ultra for $329 ($100 off)
  • JBL Tour One M2 for $199.95 ($100 off)
  • Beats Solo 4 for $99.99 ($100 off)
  • Beats Studio Pro for $159.99 ($190 off)
  • Sennheiser HD 599 for $128.20 ($72 off)
  • Sennheiser HD 600 for $284.20 ($166 off)
  • Sennheiser HD 650 for $307.97 ($192 off)
  • Anker Soundcore Space One for $69 ($31 off)
  • Bowers & Wilkins Limited Edition Px8 for $499 ($200 off)

Earbuds deals

  • Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro & $20 Amazon Gift Card for $188.98 ($81 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Buds FE for $57.98 ($42 off)
  • Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 for $179 ($50 off)
  • Pixel Buds A-Series for $59 ($40 off)
  • Apple AirPods Pro 2 for $153.99 ($95 off)
  • Anker Soundcore P20i for $19.99 ($20 off)
  • Bose QuietComfort Ultra for $229 ($70 off)
  • Sony WF-1000XM5 for $228 ($72 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds for $79.99 ($70 off)
  • Jabra Elite 85t for $169.99 ($60 off)
  • Jabra Elite 5 for $60.99 ($89 off)
  • Amazon Echo Buds for $24.99 ($25 off)

Tablets and e-readers

Ryan Whitwam / Android Authority

The Tab S9 Ultra (right) looks identical to the Tab S10 Ultra (left).

Tablets are becoming a bigger part of everyday life each year, whether you’re sketching, streaming, reading, or even conquering your inbox. If you need a new multitasking slate or an e-reader to escape into your next favorite book, Black Friday has something for you. From big brands to budget-friendly finds, these deals could help you upgrade your slate or finally grab that model you’ve been eyeing.

Google Pixel 9 Pro XL

Google Pixel 9 Pro XL

Pure XL-ence.

Google reserves its best hardware for the largest device in the line. The Google Pixel 9 Pro XL offers a 6.8-inch display, the biggest battery we've ever seen in a Pixel phone, and 37W wired charging. Otherwise, the Pixel 9 Pro and the Pixel 9 Pro XL share almost all other hardware and software features, giving users the option between display sizes with top hardware.

Tablet deals 

  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Plus for $849.99 ($150 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra for $999.99 ($200 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE for $299.99 ($150 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Plus for $149 ($71 off)
  • Google Pixel Tablet for $279 ($120 off)
  • Google Pixel Tablet (256GB) with Charging Speaker Dock for $459 ($140 off)
  • OnePlus Pad for $370.64 ($109 off)
  • Apple iPad (10th Gen) for $249.99 ($99 off)
  • Apple iPad Air 13-inch (2024) for $699 ($100 off)
  • Apple iPad Air 11-inch (2024) for $499 ($100 off)
  • New Amazon Kindle for $84.99 ($25 off)
  • New Kindle Paperwhite for $129.99 ($30 off)
  • Amazon Fire HD 10 for $74.99 ($65 off)
  • Amazon Fire Max 11 for $139.99 ($90 off)

Smartwatches and fitness trackers

C. Scott Brown / Android Authority

From tracking fitness goals to delivering notifications at a glance, wearables have become an everyday essential for many of us. Black Friday deals make it a perfect time to explore what’s new in smartwatches, fitness bands, and other wearable tech. With options ranging from minimalist designs to feature-packed models, there’s something for everyone looking to streamline their routines or gain insights into their activity levels.

Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm)

Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm)

The 10th-gen Apple Watch Series.

The Apple Watch Series 10 marks a decade of innovation with a refreshed design, featuring slightly larger screen options, a thinner case, and a significant health upgrade with sleep apnea detection.

Smartwatch and fitness tracker deals

  • Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra for $434.29 ($216 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 for $202.60 ($87 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 for $149.99 ($150 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic for $239.99 ($160 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Watch FE for $126.71 ($73 off)
  • Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm) for $329 ($70 off)
  • Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) for $169 ($80 off)
  • Garmin Venu 3 for $349.99 ($100 off)
  • Garmin Forerunner 255 for $249.99 ($100 off)
  • Garmin Instinct 2 for $199.99 ($100 off)
  • Google Pixel Watch 3 (45mm, Wi-Fi) for $329.99 ($70 off)
  • Google Pixel Watch 2 for $145 ($105 off)
  • Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 5 for $209.99 ($140 off)
  • Amazfit Falcon Premium for $349.99 ($150 off)
  • Amazfit Cheetah Pro for $179.99 ($120 off)
  • Amazfit Band 7 for $39.99 ($10 off)

Smart ring deals

  • Oura Ring Gen 3 Horizon for $249 ($50 off)
  • Oura Ring Gen 3 Horizon Stealth for $279 ($70 off)
